entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:36 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:36 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
